name: Crash Corp.
description:
Entry for Mini Jam 32: Explosions - Explosions must be a core mechanic

Keep the road clear so the bus can safely get to the other side of the neighbourhood. Collect TV Sets throughout the neighbourhood to speed the bus up. Get the bus across the hood in as little time as possible.

Dev by reals

Music by Keytar Bard (using bosca ceoil)
